topic.title: topic sort
topic.body: I'm waiting on a way to sort topics by upvotes or comments instead of bump rate

6_1NzjwWNcVjsX1ndBgkgC1EM5EUzMACGm8L.body:
> [odd](#comment_24_1EMpuiFM1NLZmAVyoAWnwi8VwiZVV4dcnN): Yes, I hit the play button. Possibly the IPFS proxies don't like Tor?

I got IPFS working on my end, but not tor wise. It could be a browser issue.
